title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of the RealTimeTrafficManagementSystem in smart cities.

title: Develop Sensor Data Collection Module
description: Design and implement the module responsible for collecting data from various sensors.

title: Implement Real-time Data Processing Module
description: Design and implement the module that processes traffic data in real-time.

title: Design Traffic Signal Control Algorithm
description: Develop an efficient algorithm for controlling traffic signals based on real-time data.

title: Develop User Interface for Traffic Managers
description: Design and implement the user interface for city traffic managers.

title: Set Up Database Schema for Traffic Data Storage
description: Design and set up the database schema for storing traffic data.

title: Configure and Deploy Cloud Infrastructure
description: Set up the necessary cloud infrastructure for the RealTimeTrafficManagementSystem.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Tests
description: Test the overall functionality and performance of the RealTimeTrafficManagementSystem.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Traffic Managers
Set Up Database Schema for Traffic Data Storage
